snippet: Jordan Jones of Golden, Colo., and Amy Bevilacqua of Wilton, Conn., won the New York City Triathlon in soaring temperatures.
abstract: Jordan Jones and Amy Bevilacqua win the New York City Triathlon in soaring temperatures.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Jones of Golden, Colo., and Amy Bevilacqua of Wilton, Conn., won the New York City Triathlon in soaring temperatures.

headline.seo: Nearly 3,500 Finish New York City Triathlon on Hot Day
headline.main: After Added Precautions, Nearly 3,500 Finish New York Race on a Hot Day
headline.print_headline: After Added Precautions, Nearly 3,500 Finish New York Race on a Hot Day
